website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, the RIM BlackBerry Style's practical design and advanced feature set make it a great smartphone for BlackBerry newbies and veterans alike.
pros: The RIM BlackBerry Style combines a clamshell form factor and a full QWERTY keyboard
It ships with BlackBerry OS 6, which has an improved user interface, a new WebKit browser, and a better multimedia experience
cons: The Style's square design may be a bit bulky for some users, and the keyboard is a touch too flat for our tastes

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Blackberry Style
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and compact, this sweet blackberry is my young sisters best friend, I bought it for her and I have been her favorite brother ever since. Its absolutely one you wanna try out. Its user friendly and easy to store. Just a reminder, the one I have is sim card free, so it can work better within the US and maybe Canada or Europe. Its a great phone...
customer_reviews.author: Wana

customer_reviews.title: Blackberry Flip Phone
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I had the Lotus before could not find one at a reasonable price so I purchased this one. It is a little more difficult to use if you are not familiar with Blackberry but it has a large screen which makes it easier to see. The trackball takes some getting used to. I love it mainly because it is a flip! Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Bkelly5000

customer_reviews.title: Best seller
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this phone. I just use it for talk and text, it's very good

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had another one
customer_reviews.text: Best ohone ever, why are the phasing out flip phones, everyone that see mine wishes for one

customer_reviews.title: can not be used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone, but guess what, it can't be activated! So okay, default, bought another. Same problem! Screw this, waste of time. Waiting for my refund.

customer_reviews.title: Old School Blackberry Treasure
customer_reviews.text: Finding this vendor was what makes Amazon shopping so great. Purchased for a friend who is a faithful and true Blackberry fan, and the Style flip phone is a classic. It also takes great pix.
customer_reviews.author: CamilaG

customer_reviews.title: To: trustedtarri
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a Sprint Blackberry Style cell phone from you in late February thru Amazon.com. Today (June 3, 2014), tried to activate the phone. After hours of effort, Sprint informed me that they could not activate the phone because it had been originally sold to foreign sources and could not be activated in the United States. I wish to return this phone and receive a reimbursement for my purchase. Please advise as to how this can be accomplished. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Smith

customer_reviews.title: beautiful in design
customer_reviews.text: beautiful in design. Not as many ring tones as I wooulld have liked, but a beauty. It does take asome extra time to get used to the Blackberry OS, but nothing beyond reasonble.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Nothing less nothing more just what I need and expected. Phone was in great condition even though it was used.

customer_reviews.title: wrong item shipped
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item 3 times, and received the wrong item all 3 times. None of the items were "SPRINT" phones, all had been assigned to different carriers than Sprint. Two items were purchased from "trustedtarri" and one from "tablet distributors". Refunds were given without fuss on all three items, but I never got the phone I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Not what it seems
customer_reviews.text: well this is a really great phone, but if your trying to get this phone to another company other than sprint, its useless!! :/ this phone you can't unlock from sprint!! Don't recommend it unless you activate it w/sprint which is really expensive!! :/

customer_reviews.title: CDMA. Really? Bad.
customer_reviews.text: Hello. I want to know where in this publication you tell us that the cellphone is CDMA. Yes, i know you say is "locked for sprint" but, "locked" isn't the same to "CDMA" I'm from Venezuela, and this phone just arrive to my home, and guess what? I can't use this here 'cause is CDMA, and my no one telephony here accept a cellphone CDMA of another country, even if i unlocked the cellphone for whichever telephony. So, what i do now? I lost my money because of you? I want to know that. Thanks you. I feel really cheated.

product_meta.title: Blackberry Style 9670 Smartphone - Sprint
feature_bullets: 3G-enabled BlackBerry flip phone in purple with dual displays and full QWERTY keyboard; runs BlackBerry 6 OS
3G speeds via Sprint Mobile Broadband Network; Sprint TV enabled; GPS turn-by-turn directions via Sprint Navigation
Wireless-N Wi-Fi; 5-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD memory expansion; HTML web browser
Up to 4.5 hours of talk time, up to 250 hours (10.5 days) of standby time; released in November, 2010

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars88 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
